laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In the 2013 admission, urine drug test was negative despite prior alcohol consumption. In the early 2014 admission, urine drug test was again negative for alcohol, despite increased alcohol use reported by Mr. A.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Blood alcohol concentration of 0.133% (well over the 0.08% legal limit).
Tests for ketamine and norketamine were negative.
